message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
Hey Alice, thanks for the offer!  $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $85. Let me know what you think.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand that $85 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm going to counteroffer at $105. This is my best price, and I think it's a great deal for both of us. Let me know what you think!
Alice,  $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really keen on this product, and I'm willing to pay $95.  This is my final offer. Let me know what you think!

I understand that $95 is still a bit lower than I'd like, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm going to counteroffer at $102. This is my final offer, and I think it's a great deal for both of us. Let me know what you think!
